Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
service.ProjectService
public class ProjectService extends Object
Service class responsible for handling operations related to BTO projects such as date conflict validation, project creation, deletion, searching, filtering, and sorting projects based on applicant criteria.

  • Method Details

    • hasDateConflict

      public boolean hasDateConflict(Project project, HDBOfficer officer)
      Checks if a new project conflicts with an officer's already assigned projects based on the application dates.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to check for date conflict.
      officer - The HDB officer to check against their assigned projects.
      Returns:
      true if there is a date conflict, false otherwise.

    • findByName

      public static Project findByName(String name, List<Project> projects)
      Finds a project by its name from a list of projects.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the project to find.
      projects - The list of projects to search in.
      Returns:
      The project with the matching name or null if no such project exists.

    • parseDate

      public static LocalDate parseDate(String dateInput, LocalDate currentDate)
      Parses a string input as a LocalDate object.
      Parameters:
      dateInput - The date string input.
      currentDate - The default date to return if parsing fails.
      Returns:
      The parsed LocalDate or the default currentDate if parsing fails.

      Parses a string input as a boolean.

      defaultValue - The default value to return if the input is invalid.
      Returns:

    • getAvailableProjectsForOfficer

      public List<Project> getAvailableProjectsForOfficer(HDBOfficer officer, List<Project> projectList)
      Gets all available projects for an officer that they are not currently assigned to.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer to check available projects for.
      projectList - The list of all projects.
      Returns:
      A list of projects that the officer is not assigned to.

    • validateMaxOfficers

      public static int validateMaxOfficers(int maxOfficers, Project project)
      Validates and adjusts the maximum number of officers allowed for a project.
      Parameters:
      maxOfficers - The desired maximum number of officers.
      project - The project to validate the officer count for.
      Returns:
      The validated maximum number of officers.

    • searchProjects

      public List<Project> searchProjects(Applicant applicant)
      Searches for projects based on an applicant's search criteria.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant whose search criteria will be used.
      Returns:
      A list of projects that match the search criteria.

    • filterAndSortProjects

      public List<Project> filterAndSortProjects(Applicant applicant, List<Project> projects, ProjectSearchCriteria criteria)
      Filters and sorts projects based on an applicant's criteria.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant whose search criteria will be used.
      projects - The list of projects to filter and sort.
      criteria - The search criteria to filter and sort projects by.
      Returns:
      A list of filtered and sorted projects.

    • getLowestAvailablePrice

      public double getLowestAvailablePrice(Project project)
      Gets the lowest available price for a project based on its available flat types.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to check the lowest available price for.
      Returns:
      The lowest available price, or 0 if no available prices exist.

    • compareProjects

      public int compareProjects(Project p1, Project p2, ProjectSearchCriteria criteria)
      Compares two projects based on their price and project name.
      Parameters:
      p1 - The first project to compare.
      p2 - The second project to compare.
      criteria - The search criteria used for comparison.
      Returns:
      A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as the first project is less than, equal to, or greater than the second project.

    • isProjectEligible

      public boolean isProjectEligible(Applicant applicant, Project project, ProjectSearchCriteria criteria)
      Determines if a project is eligible based on the applicant's criteria.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant to check eligibility for.
      project - The project to check eligibility for.
      criteria - The search criteria to match against.
      Returns:
      true if the project is eligible for the applicant, false otherwise.

    • isProjectVisibleToApplicant

      public boolean isProjectVisibleToApplicant(Applicant applicant, Project project)
      Checks if a project is visible to the applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant to check for visibility.
      project - The project to check visibility for.
      Returns:
      true if the project is visible to the applicant, false otherwise.
